creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: upper applique scrolled design with six black and white pinwheels surrounding two (approx. 3 1/2") squares in red, white, green and orange; lower panel has a large center square with scroll work surrounding dragon-like creature; around square more scroll work with three birds and two worms--color as above; narrow multicolored tapes and wider blue border all around; dark 3 piece lining
title: Baby Carrier
